item.title: AMD’s new 96-core Threadripper CPU will set you back $11,699
item.description: AMD’s latest Zen 5-based Ryzen Threadripper Pro 9000 WX-Series of CPUs go on sale later this month, and the top option will be priced at $11,699. The 9000 WX-Series chips are designed for workstations

item.title: TikTok is putting the spotlight on songwriters
